#include <stdio.h>

unsigned long long int check(unsigned long long int dx,unsigned long long int dy)
{
	unsigned long long int k;
	k=dx-dy;
	if(k<0) k=k*(-1);
	return k%2;
}

int main()
{
	unsigned long long int t,x1,x2,y1,y2,n,dx,dy;
	scanf("%llu",&t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%llu",&n);
		scanf("%llu",&x1);
		scanf("%llu",&y1);
		scanf("%llu",&x2);
		scanf("%llu",&y2);

		dx=x1-x2;
		if(x2>x1) {
			dx=dx*(-1);
		}

		dy=y1-y2;
		if(y2>y1) {
			dy=dy*(-1);
		}

		


//		if(x1>n||x2>n||y1>n||y2>n) {
//			printf("-1\n");
//		}
		if(x1==x2&&y1==y2) {
			printf("0\n");
		}
		else if(dx==dy) {
			printf("1\n");
		}
		else if(check(dx,dy)) {
			printf("-1\n");
		}
		else {
			printf("2\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
